description: Ꮎ ᏔᎵ ᏗᎧᏃᎮᏗ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏪᏌ ᎠᏂᏓ ᏧᎾᏤᎵ ᏗᎵᏰᏑᎶ ᏗᏂᏲᎱᏎᎯ ᎠᎴ ᏥᏔᎦ ᎤᏍᏗ (ᏏᎩᏏ ᎠᎩᏏ). ᏣᎳᎩᎭ ᎦᏬᏂᎯᏍᏗ. The two stories of the three kittens who lost their mittens and Chicken Little (Henney Penny). Cherokee language only.
subjects: Foreign Language Study, Native American Languages
title: Ꮎ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏪᏌ ᎠᏂᏓ ᎠᎴ ᏥᏔᎦ ᎤᏍᏗ. The Three Kittens and Chicken Little.
